attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to have the Department of Children, School and Families to change the new regulation regarding Childminding assistants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Previously childminders who had registered assistants were able to leave them in sole charge of children (for a short amount of time) with written permission from the parents but since the new EYFS has come into action the regulation has been changed to read: "The childminder must be present at all times on the relevant premises where children are cared for" these changes cause disruption to continuity of care and / or affect contractual arrangements that we have in place and we are seeking for this to be changed back.
